body_html: I think if we keep the docs consistent (notice how it says log probabilities instead of log-odds here, I'm gonna fix that in a sec. ) we can use logits everywhere. If not, maybe multiclass_logits or multi_logits is a better name since it will also be used in Categorical.
body_text: I think if we keep the docs consistent (notice how it says log probabilities instead of log-odds here, I'm gonna fix that in a sec. ) we can use logits everywhere. If not, maybe multiclass_logits or multi_logits is a better name since it will also be used in Categorical.
body: I think if we keep the docs consistent (notice how it says log probabilities instead of log-odds here, I'm gonna fix that in a sec. ) we can use `logits` everywhere. If not, maybe `multiclass_logits` or `multi_logits` is a better name since it will also be used in Categorical.
